fish.name: Goldfish
fish.description: The goldfish is a freshwater fish and one of the most commonly kept aquarium fish. It is native to East Asia but is widely cultivated in many parts of the world.

fish.name: Betta Fish
fish.description: Also known as Siamese fighting fish, the Betta fish is popular for its vibrant colors and long, flowing fins. They are native to Southeast Asia.

fish.name: Angelfish
fish.description: Angelfish are freshwater cichlids known for their distinctive shape and behavior. They are native to the Amazon River basin and are popular in aquariums.

fish.name: Clownfish
fish.description: Clownfish, also known as anemonefish, are small, brightly colored fish known for their symbiotic relationship with sea anemones. They are found in warmer waters of the Indian and Pacific Oceans.
